Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Musician \Mu*si"cian\, n. [F. musicien.] One skilled in the art or science of music; esp., a skilled singer, or performer on a musical instrument. [1913 Webster]
musician n 1: someone who plays a musical instrument (as a profession) [syn: {instrumentalist}, {player}] 2: artist who composes or conducts music as a profession
